function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Occupant window-opening behavior affecting air change rates","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of residential exposure to contaminants","Mitigation":"Account for occupant window-opening behavior in predicting residential exposures","Technologies":"Indoor air quality sensors, occupancy sensors, building management systems","People":"Residential occupants","Owner":"Researchers, building designers, homeowners"},{"Description":"High air change rates from window-opening behavior","Impact":"Increased potential for indoor contaminants from outdoor sources","Mitigation":"Educating occupants about the impact of window-opening behavior on indoor air quality, promoting alternative ventilation methods","Technologies":"Air purifiers, mechanical ventilation systems","People":"Residential occupants","Owner":"Public health organizations, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Measuring variability in air change rate due to window-opening behavior","Impact":"Misinterpretation of air change rate variability in research studies","Mitigation":"Include window-opening behavior as a variable in air change rate studies, control for window-opening behavior in data analysis","Technologies":"Airflow measurement devices, data analysis tools","People":"Researchers, scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"}]}
